short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Towleroad is news with homosexual tendencies, the go-to site for gay entertainment, politics, travel, media and men.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the Chrome extension to the most well-respected gay news site, covering politics, entertainment, media, travel and style. You'll want to know when news breaks and you will. This offers access to a search of the many years of comprehensive coverage on Towleroad of gay new, politics and entertainment. "Towleroad is my go-so site for gay news," -- Armistead Maupin
